properties.name: spring.cloud.gcp.bigquery.enabled
properties.description: Auto-configure Google Cloud BigQuery components.

properties.name: spring.cloud.gcp.config.enabled
properties.description: Auto-configure Google Cloud Runtime components.

properties.name: spring.cloud.gcp.datastore.enabled
properties.description: Auto-configure Google Cloud Datastore components.

properties.name: spring.cloud.gcp.firestore.enabled
properties.description: Auto-configure Google Cloud Firestore components.

properties.name: spring.cloud.gcp.firestore.emulator.enabled
properties.description: Enables autoconfiguration to use the Firestore emulator.

properties.name: spring.cloud.gcp.kms.enabled
properties.description: Auto-configure Google Cloud Key Management Service (KMS).

properties.name: spring.cloud.gcp.logging.enabled
properties.description: Auto-configure Google Cloud Stackdriver logging for Spring MVC.

properties.name: spring.cloud.gcp.metrics.enabled
properties.description: Auto-configure Google Cloud Monitoring for Micrometer.

properties.name: spring.cloud.gcp.pubsub.enabled
properties.description: Auto-configure Google Cloud Pub/Sub components.

properties.name: spring.cloud.gcp.pubsub.binder.enabled
properties.description: Auto-configure Google Cloud Pub/Sub Stream Binder components.

properties.name: spring.cloud.gcp.pubsub.reactive.enabled
properties.description: Auto-configure Google Cloud Pub/Sub Reactive components.

properties.name: spring.cloud.gcp.spanner.enabled
properties.description: Auto-configure Google Cloud Spanner components.

properties.name: spring.cloud.gcp.spanner.emulator.enabled
properties.description: Enables auto-configuration to use the Spanner emulator.

properties.name: spring.cloud.gcp.sql.jdbc.enabled
properties.description: Enables auto-configuration for JDBC support in Google Cloud SQL.

properties.name: spring.cloud.gcp.sql.enabled
properties.description: Auto-configure Google Cloud SQL support components.

properties.name: spring.cloud.gcp.sql.r2dbc.enabled
properties.description: Enables auto-configuration for R2DBC support in Google Cloud SQL.

properties.name: spring.cloud.gcp.secretmanager.enabled
properties.description: Auto-configure GCP Secret Manager support components.

properties.name: spring.cloud.gcp.trace.enabled
properties.description: Auto-configure Google Cloud Stackdriver tracing components.

properties.name: spring.cloud.gcp.trace.pubsub.enabled
properties.description: Auto-configure trace instrumentation of Pub/Sub components.

properties.name: spring.cloud.gcp.storage.enabled
properties.description: Auto-configure Google Cloud Storage components.

properties.name: spring.cloud.gcp.security.iap.enabled
properties.description: Auto-configure Google Cloud IAP identity extraction components.

properties.name: spring.cloud.gcp.vision.enabled
properties.description: Auto-configure Google Cloud Vision components.

properties.name: spring.cloud.gcp.core.enabled
properties.description: Auto-configure Google Cloud Core components.

properties.name: management.health.pubsub.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable the Pub/Sub health indicator when used with Spring Boot Actuator.
